mapper.select: select offer_id, type_id, offer_produce_id, offer_time, offer_customer_name, offer_product_name, size_id, offer_number, offer_cover_grammage, paper_id_cover, offer_cover_p, color_id_cover, offer_cover_prive, offer_core_grammage, paper_id_core, offer_core_p, color_id_core, offer_core_price, offer_inset_grammage, paper_id_inset, offer_inset_p, color_id_inset, offer_inset_price, offer_amoun_price, amoun_id, offer_binding_price, binding_id, offer_delivery_price, offer_process_1_price, offer_process_2_price, offer_process_3_price, offer_process_4_price, offer_process_5_price, offer_process_1_name, offer_process_2_name, offer_process_3_name, offer_process_4_name, offer_process_5_name, offer_machining_price, offer_total_price from mf_offer.mf_offer where offer_id = #{offerId}

select offer_id, type_id, offer_produce_id, offer_time, offer_customer_name, offer_product_name, size_id, offer_number, offer_cover_grammage, paper_id_cover, offer_cover_p, color_id_cover, offer_cover_prive, offer_core_grammage, paper_id_core, offer_core_p, color_id_core, offer_core_price, offer_inset_grammage, paper_id_inset, offer_inset_p, color_id_inset, offer_inset_price, offer_amoun_price, amoun_id, offer_binding_price, binding_id, offer_delivery_price, offer_process_1_price, offer_process_2_price, offer_process_3_price, offer_process_4_price, offer_process_5_price, offer_process_1_name, offer_process_2_name, offer_process_3_name, offer_process_4_name, offer_process_5_name, offer_machining_price, offer_total_price from mf_offer.mf_offer limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into mf_offer.mf_offer(type_id, offer_produce_id, offer_time, offer_customer_name, offer_product_name, size_id, offer_number, offer_cover_grammage, paper_id_cover, offer_cover_p, color_id_cover, offer_cover_prive, offer_core_grammage, paper_id_core, offer_core_p, color_id_core, offer_core_price, offer_inset_grammage, paper_id_inset, offer_inset_p, color_id_inset, offer_inset_price, offer_amoun_price, amoun_id, offer_binding_price, binding_id, offer_delivery_price, offer_process_1_price, offer_process_2_price, offer_process_3_price, offer_process_4_price, offer_process_5_price, offer_process_1_name, offer_process_2_name, offer_process_3_name, offer_process_4_name, offer_process_5_name, offer_machining_price, offer_total_price) values (#{typeId}, default, #{offerTime}, #{offerCustomerName}, #{offerProductName}, #{sizeId}, #{offerNumber}, #{offerCoverGrammage}, #{paperIdCover}, #{offerCoverP}, #{colorIdCover}, #{offerCoverPrive}, #{offerCoreGrammage}, #{paperIdCore}, #{offerCoreP}, #{colorIdCore}, #{offerCorePrice}, #{offerInsetGrammage}, #{paperIdInset}, #{offerInsetP}, #{colorIdInset}, #{offerInsetPrice}, #{offerAmounPrice}, #{amounId}, #{offerBindingPrice}, #{bindingId}, #{offerDeliveryPrice}, #{offerProcess1Price}, #{offerProcess2Price}, #{offerProcess3Price}, #{offerProcess4Price}, #{offerProcess5Price}, #{offerProcess1Name}, #{offerProcess2Name}, #{offerProcess3Name}, #{offerProcess4Name}, #{offerProcess5Name}, #{offerMachiningPrice}, #{offerTotalPrice})
mapper.update:
